participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and reflective, she enjoys connecting with others and values family.
participant_1.background: I'm not sure yet, I'm still trying to figure out what my new plans are. I have a puppy named Tiki. I am originally from London, England. Since my dog died, I am incomplete. I love that I can be there for my son while he's growing up.

participant_2.name: Lena
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and social, she is passionate about her work and enjoys exploring new places.
participant_2.background: I am trying to keep myself fit and healthy. I haven't worked at my current job for very long because I just moved to Vienna. I want to learn how to train my dog so that we can go on longer hikes together. I have a rose tattooed on my right ankle. I sell cosmetics in my spare time and help my sister Madonna with her beauty business.

content.text: Hi! I'm from London, England. Where are you from?
Hi! I moved to Vienna recently, but I'm originally from Austria.
Oh cool! What made you move to Vienna?
I got a job here, and I wanted to experience something new.
That makes sense. What do you do for work?
I'm a sales manager for a cosmetics company.
Oh cool! How do you like it?
It's great! I get to travel a lot and meet new people.
That sounds awesome! I'm a stay at home mom, so I don't get to travel much.
That's great! I'm sure your son is really lucky to have you.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go hiking, shopping, and spend time with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go hiking too.
Oh cool! We should go hiking together sometime!
Great! We can exchange numbers and plan something.
